tasks.title: FDF Captions Not Persisting Locally
tasks.description: FDF captions are not persisting in local storage before syncing. They disappear when navigating out and back into a room.
acceptance_criteria: FDF captions persist locally after entry
Captions remain visible when navigating out and back into a room
Captions do not require sync to be visible locally

tasks.title: FDF Annotations on Images Not Persisting Locally
tasks.description: FDF annotations on images are not persisting in local storage before syncing.
acceptance_criteria: Image annotations persist locally after creation
Annotations remain visible when navigating out and back into a room
Annotations do not require sync to be visible locally

tasks.title: Background Sync Pausing When App Not Active
tasks.description: Syncing pauses when the app is not open or when navigating to a different project/template. Need syncing to persist as long as the app is not killed.
acceptance_criteria: Syncing continues when app is in background (not killed)
Syncing continues when navigating to a different project
Sync only stops when app is fully terminated
